@graph.name: RO-Crate Machine Actionable Profile
@graph.description: This is a mini-profile for RO-Crate itself

@graph.name: RO-Crate Metadadata Descriptor
@graph.Description: An RO-Crate @graph must contain an entity of Type @CreativeWork which is known as the RO-Crate Metadata descriptor.

@graph.description: This property on the RO-Crate Metadata Descriptor references the Root Data Entity. I a SoSS+ profile there may be Schemas present for more than one 'flavour' of Root Data Enitty with different @type arrays or `@conformsTo` references (or other specializations). In this example there is a single reference.
@graph.name: about (Root Data Entity)

@graph.description: The Root Data Entity for an RO-Crate. This is the main entity of the RO-Crate and is the one that is referenced by the RO-Crate Metadata Descriptor.
@graph.name: Root Data Entity

@graph.rdfs:label: name
@graph.name: name
@graph.rdfs:comment: SHOULD identify the dataset to humans well enough to disambiguate it from other RO-Crates

@graph.rdfs:label: description
@graph.name: description
@graph.rdfs:comment: (In addition to the name) SHOULD further elaborate on the name to provide a summary of the context in which the dataset is important.

@graph.rdfs:label: datePublished
@graph.name: datePublished
@graph.rdfs:comment: MUST be a string in ISO 8601 date format and SHOULD be specified to at least the precision of a day, MAY be a timestamp down to the millisecond.

@graph.rdfs:label: license
@graph.name: license
@graph.rdfs:comment: SHOULD link to a Contextual Entity in the RO-Crate Metadata File with a name and description. MAY have a URI (eg for Creative Commons or Open Source licenses). MAY if necessary be a textual description of how the RO-Crate may be used

@graph.name: License (Creative Work)
@graph.description: A license included as a Creative Work - with at least a name and description
